content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be a great place to live. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 500 euros per month. That would be a real bargain for such a great apartment in the city center, don't you think?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 euros per month is a very generous offer, but I must be honest with you. This apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which usually commands a higher rent. I'm sure you understand that I need to get the best possible price for my investment. How about we start at 750 euros per month? This is a fair price considering the quality of the apartment and its location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. However, I am currently living in a smaller and less comfortable apartment, but I am only paying 450 euros per month. So, I think 550 euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. I am willing to sign a long-term contract.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 euros per month is certainly more in line with what I was expecting. However, I believe that a long-term contract deserves a better rate. How about we meet in the middle at 600 euros per month? This is a good compromise, and it reflects the value of the apartment as well as your commitment to a long-term lease. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for hearing me out, Mister Schmidt. I think 580 euros per month would be a fair price. I am ready to sign a two-year contract. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, you've been very reasonable in your negotiations. I appreciate your willingness to commit to a two-year contract. Let's make this deal even more attractive for both of us. If you agree to pay 590 euros per month, I'll be happy to include all utilities in that price. You won't have to worry about any additional costs for water, gas, or electricity. What do you think? Is this a fair compromise?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. I think 590 euros per month with all utilities included is a fair price. I agree to the price of 590 euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be yours for 590 euros per month, including all utilities. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease, and we'll finalize the paperwork. Welcome to your new home! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
